message: Bob, I propose we start with a 60/40 split in my favor.  It's a good deal for you in the early rounds, considering the inflation.
Alice, your offer was a bit too much in your favor. Let's be fair, I propose a 55/45 split in my favor. The inflation is hitting me harder, so I need a better starting point.
Bob, it's clear we both want a larger share.  I'll meet you in the middle - 55/45 in my favor. This is a fair counter offer considering the inflation is hitting you harder.
